thread.title: Peter Andre hints he could bring back reality TV show with wife Emily 'willing to be filmed' - but what about the kids?
thread.title_full: Peter Andre hints he could bring back reality TV show with wife Emily 'willing to be filmed' - but what about the kids?

author: Lara Martin
title: Peter Andre hints he could bring back reality TV show with wife Emily 'willing to be filmed' - but what about the kids?
text:
Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Peter Andre hasn’t ruled out the possibility of bringing back his reality show - though he’s staying tight lipped on any other details. 
The Mysterious Girl singer teased the idea in his weekly New magazine column, which would mean a return to reality TV following a four year absence. 
Pete, 44, wrote: “A lot of people have been asking me about bringing my reality show back, you never know!” 
His last stint on reality TV was his ITV2 series Peter Andre: My Life, which ran from 2011 to 2013 and documented, among other things, his romance with now wife Emily. Pete has hinted he could return to reality TV (Photo: Getty) Peter with wife Emily Peter Andre shares rare photo of daughter Amelia picking flowers in their HUGE garden 
But he chose to quit reality TV partly because Emily, 27, prefers to stay out of the spotlight, and also because he wanted to “go out on a high” with good ratings. 
“It's going to be the tenth series since I started and we go on a high. The ratings have been amazing. The last series had the highest ratings we've ever had and I thought, let's leave it on a high and bow out gracefully,” he told This Morning. 
“I am with someone who is a lot more private and even though I am public and I could never ask for privacy, you have to also respect the other person. 
"But it's not just that, I do honestly think that we've done it and the public have been amazing, and I would hate it for the ratings to start slipping and then I have to stop." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
